specialEffects.name: EXP Gain UP Lv. 1
specialEffects.desc: Increases EXP gained in battle by 5%.

specialEffects.name: EXP Gain UP Lv. 2
specialEffects.desc: Increases EXP gained in battle by 6%.

specialEffects.name: EXP Gain UP Lv. 3
specialEffects.desc: Increases EXP gained in battle by 7%.

specialEffects.name: EXP Gain UP Lv. 4
specialEffects.desc: Increases EXP gained in battle by 8%.

specialEffects.name: EXP Gain UP Lv. 5
specialEffects.desc: Increases EXP gained in battle by 10%.

specialEffects.name: Chance to Inflict Status Effects UP Lv. 1
specialEffects.desc: Increases chance of inflicting status effects by 2%.

specialEffects.name: Chance to Inflict Status Effects UP Lv. 2
specialEffects.desc: Increases chance of inflicting status effects by 2.5%.

specialEffects.name: Chance to Inflict Status Effects UP Lv. 3
specialEffects.desc: Increases chance of inflicting status effects by 3%.

specialEffects.name: Chance to Inflict Status Effects UP Lv. 4
specialEffects.desc: Increases chance of inflicting status effects by 3.5%.

specialEffects.name: Chance to Inflict Status Effects UP Lv. 5
specialEffects.desc: Increases chance of inflicting status effects by 5%.

specialEffects.name: Extend Buff Effect Lv. 1
specialEffects.desc: Increases duration of buff effects from skills by 5%.

specialEffects.name: Extend Buff Effect Lv. 2
specialEffects.desc: Increases duration of buff effects from skills by 10%.

specialEffects.name: Extend Buff Effect Lv. 3
specialEffects.desc: Increases duration of buff effects from skills by 15%.

specialEffects.name: Extend Buff Effect Lv. 4
specialEffects.desc: Increases duration of buff effects from skills by 20%.

specialEffects.name: Extend Buff Effect Lv. 5
specialEffects.desc: Increases duration of buff effects from skills by 30%.

specialEffects.name: Col Gain UP Lv. 1
specialEffects.desc: Increases Col gained in battle by 2%.

specialEffects.name: Col Gain UP Lv. 2
specialEffects.desc: Increases Col gained in battle by 3%.

specialEffects.name: Col Gain UP Lv. 3
specialEffects.desc: Increases Col gained in battle by 4%.

specialEffects.name: Col Gain UP Lv. 4
specialEffects.desc: Increases Col gained in battle by 5%.

specialEffects.name: Col Gain UP Lv. 5
specialEffects.desc: Increases Col gained in battle by 10%.

specialEffects.name: Faster Advanced Skill Cooldown Lv. 1
specialEffects.desc: Increases Advanced Skill cooldown speed by 2%.

specialEffects.name: Faster Advanced Skill Cooldown Lv. 2
specialEffects.desc: Increases Advanced Skill cooldown speed by 4%.

specialEffects.name: Faster Advanced Skill Cooldown Lv. 3
specialEffects.desc: Increases Advanced Skill cooldown speed by 6%.

specialEffects.name: Faster Advanced Skill Cooldown Lv. 4
specialEffects.desc: Increases Advanced Skill cooldown speed by 8%.

specialEffects.name: Faster Advanced Skill Cooldown Lv. 5
specialEffects.desc: Increases Advanced Skill cooldown speed by 10%.

specialEffects.name: Advanced Skill Instant Cooldown Lv. 1
specialEffects.desc:
4% chance for an instant cooldown when
using an Advanced Skill.
Effects do not stack.
Highest LV will be applied.

specialEffects.name: Advanced Skill Instant Cooldown Lv. 2
specialEffects.desc:
8% chance for an instant cooldown when
using an Advanced Skill.
Effects do not stack.
Highest LV will be applied.

specialEffects.desc:
12% chance for an instant cooldown when
using an Advanced Skill.
Effects do not stack.
Highest LV will be applied.

specialEffects.name: Advanced Skill Instant Cooldown Lv. 4
specialEffects.desc:
16% chance for an instant cooldown when
using an Advanced Skill.
Effects do not stack.
Highest LV will be applied.

specialEffects.name: Advanced Skill Instant Cooldown Lv. 5
specialEffects.desc:
20% chance for an instant cooldown when
using an Advanced Skill.
Effects do not stack.
Highest LV will be applied.

specialEffects.name: Faster Ultimate Cooldown Lv. 1
specialEffects.desc: Increases cooldown speed of Ultimate by 2%.

specialEffects.name: Faster Ultimate Cooldown Lv. 2
specialEffects.desc: Increases cooldown speed of Ultimate by 4%.

specialEffects.name: Faster Ultimate Cooldown Lv. 3
specialEffects.desc: Increases cooldown speed of Ultimate by 6%.

specialEffects.name: Faster Ultimate Cooldown Lv. 4
specialEffects.desc: Increases cooldown speed of Ultimate by 8%.

specialEffects.name: Faster Ultimate Cooldown Lv. 5
specialEffects.desc: Increases cooldown speed of Ultimate by 10%.

specialEffects.name: Advanced Skills Inflict Poison Lv. 1
specialEffects.desc: 2% chance to inflict poison when hitting an enemy with an Advanced Skill.

specialEffects.name: Advanced Skills Inflict Poison Lv. 2
specialEffects.desc: 3% chance to inflict poison when hitting an enemy with an Advanced Skill.

specialEffects.name: Advanced Skills Inflict Poison Lv. 3
specialEffects.desc: 4% chance to inflict poison when hitting an enemy with an Advanced Skill.

specialEffects.name: Advanced Skills Inflict Poison Lv. 4
specialEffects.desc: 5% chance to inflict poison when hitting an enemy with an Advanced Skill.

specialEffects.name: Advanced Skills Inflict Poison Lv. 5
specialEffects.desc: 6% chance to inflict poison when hitting an enemy with an Advanced Skill.

specialEffects.name: Advanced Skills Inflict Stun Lv. 1
specialEffects.desc: 2% chance to inflict stun when hitting an enemy with an Advanced Skill.

specialEffects.name: Advanced Skills Inflict Stun Lv. 2
specialEffects.desc: 3% chance to inflict stun when hitting an enemy with an Advanced Skill.

specialEffects.name: Advanced Skills Inflict Stun Lv. 3
specialEffects.desc: 4% chance to inflict stun when hitting an enemy with an Advanced Skill.

specialEffects.name: Advanced Skills Inflict Stun Lv. 4
specialEffects.desc: 5% chance to inflict stun when hitting an enemy with an Advanced Skill.

specialEffects.name: Advanced Skills Inflict Stun Lv. 5
specialEffects.desc: 6% chance to inflict stun when hitting an enemy with an Advanced Skill.

specialEffects.name: Skill Cooldown Reduction on HP Loss
specialEffects.desc: Decreases the cooldown time of a random Advanced Skill by the percentage of Max HP lost upon taking damage.

specialEffects.name: Guard Damage Reduction & Max HP 50% DOWN
specialEffects.desc:
Reduces damage received while guarding
by 100%, while reducing Max HP by -50%.

specialEffects.name: Attack UP & Max HP 25% DOWN
specialEffects.desc: Increases attack by 20%, but reduces Max HP by -25%.

specialEffects.name: Critical Rate UP as HP Gets Low
specialEffects.desc: Increases the Critical Rate as HP decreases. The lower your HP, the higher the Critical Rate.

specialEffects.name: Faster Skill Cooldown as HP Gets Low
specialEffects.desc: Increases cooldown speed of Advanced Skills based on remaining HP. The lower your HP, the faster the cooldown.

specialEffects.name: Max HP 25% DOWN & Faster Ultimate Cooldown after Perfect Guard
specialEffects.desc:
Increases cooldown speed of Ultimates
by 15% upon achieving a Perfect Guard,
while decreasing Max HP by -25%.

specialEffects.name: Use 5% HP to Increase Advanced Skill Damage
specialEffects.desc: When using offensive Advanced Skills, consume 5% of your Max HP to increase damage by 30%.
